name: NotNot Revolution
description:
Not Not Revolution is a legendary pose duel where you can challenge a friend or play against the computer.  Show your best moves to gain points and became the Pose Master.

CONTROLS

ASWD : Left player

Arrows: Right player

TEAM

Yaiza A. Deserio: 2D Art, Backgrounds, UI.

Jesús Gallego Martos: 3D Art.

Antonio Quesada López: 3D Art.

Jose M. Noguera Comino: Programmer.

Darío Z: Programmer. 

Quim Torra García: Music and SFX.
